No Poverty.reason: The course focuses on "developing countries" (發展中國家), which implies a context of poverty, but does not directly address poverty alleviation strategies.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course analyzes "international political economy problems" (國際政治經濟問題) and how "politics and economy interact" (政治與經濟如何交互作用) in developing nations.
evidence: 政治與經濟如何交互作用

Reduced Inequalities.reason: The course's central theme is the study of "developing countries" (發展中國家), also referred to as "Southern countries" (南方國家), directly addressing global North-South disparities.

Climate Action.reason: The course uses Thomas Friedman's "世界又平又熱又擠" (Hot, Flat, and Crowded) as a main reference, a book known for discussing climate change.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: As a core theme, the course examines "international security" (國際安全), "democratization" (第三波民主化), and "clash of civilizations" (文明衝突), all central to this SDG.
evidence: 國際安全與國際政治經濟問題

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course focuses on "international relations" (國際關係), how actors "interact" (互動), and specifically examines countries with "diplomatic relations" (邦交國家), which are forms of partnership.
evidence: 國際關係各種成員之間又如何互動及影響
